event.title: Sub-Group: Hackamorphism
event.description:
Given that the CodeHub hack night is on hold, we're restarting the functional JS hack night.

Come along and hack on some functional code: be it JS, PureScript, Elm, or Haskell.

Space is very limited, so please only sign up if you're sure you can come.

Unfortunately food and drink will not be provided, but feel free to bring something along.
